history.title: Our History
history.content1: The Association of Latin American Countries of Kazan was born in 2022 as a result of the joint efforts of several Latin American students residing in the city. Initially they focused on organizing dances, cultural presentations and other activities that would allow them to feel more connected to their cultural heritage.
history.content2: Over time, they identified the need for an organization that would unite Latin students to promote their talents and culture. Since then, we have worked tirelessly to create educational and cultural opportunities that support our members.
history.milestone2: 2024: Celebration of the first Latin America Day and first sports event

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: Our mission is to support and accompany Latin American students during their adaptation in Russia. We are committed to promoting, teaching and preserving the rich Latin American culture, thus strengthening a sense of identity and belonging.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.statement: In the near future we see ourselves established as a leading association in Kazan for Latin American students. We want to be recognized for providing a welcoming environment where each student feels accompanied during their academic process while continuing to proudly share our diverse cultural heritage.

values.title: Our Values
values.value1Desc: We act with honesty and transparency in everything we do.
values.value2Desc: We constantly seek ways to demonstrate our culture.
values.value3Desc: We strive for the highest quality in all our events.
values.value4Desc: We care about supporting and welcoming our Latin American students.
values.value5Desc: We value collaboration and mutual respect.

swing.title: Dance Collective
swing.description1: Immerse yourself in the contagious energy of tropical music. From salsa to bachata, our dances take you on a journey through Latin America's most vibrant rhythms.
swing.description2: We provide a family-friendly environment where passion for dance unites us.

voces.title: Vocal Group
voces.description1: Revaluing Latin America's musical roots through experiential workshops with traditional instruments and ancestral techniques.
voces.description2: Learn charango, quena and vocal harmonies in an intergenerational cultural exchange space.
